description:
It`s Valentines Day, but Kazuya ruins Kyosuke`s plans by switching bodies with him to avoid the dentist. Can Kyosuke keep the clueless problem child from ruining his relationships?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi no Oaji? Kyousuke Jigoku no Valentine
The Taste of Love? Kyosuke`s Hellish Valentine
恋のお味? 恭介地獄のバレンタイン
